restaurant.name: Windmill Creek Winery & Farm Kitchen
restaurant.description: Winery & farm kitchen located in Berlin, MD — seasonal menus, events, and tastings.

faqs.question: Do you take reservations?
faqs.answer: Yes — we accept reservations for dining and special events. Use our reservation form or call us.

faqs.question: Do you offer outdoor seating?
faqs.answer: Yes — we have patios and outdoor seating when weather permits.

faqs.question: Is there a tasting room?
faqs.answer: Yes — we have a winery tasting room and offer flights and bottle sales.
